function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Decreased confidence in the safety of public transport","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the efficacy and public acceptance of safety interventions in public transport","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Significant impact on air passenger transport due to global transmission of the virus and travel restrictions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the return of passenger air demand to pre-pandemic levels","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Financial support for the aviation industry granted without strict environmental conditions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness of the effects of mobility and travel behavior on disease transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffective implementation of responsible transport concept","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Resistance to change in global transport policies and planning","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapidly changing policy and service environment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"New technological and service innovations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of suitable modes for responsible transport","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Traveling for work-related activities increases the risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Imported items and perishable foodstuffs are likely to be transported by air, increasing the risk of spreading contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for local cultural and religious practices during travel increases the risk of cultural transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduction in the provision of quality public and active transport alternatives due to veneration of private car","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Struggles in promoting public transport due to social distancing measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of overcrowding in public transport","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Encouraging individual responsibility for personal actions can create a false sense of security and lead to complacency in following public health guidelines.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on individual responsibility may lead to a lack of oversight and regulation in ensuring safety and hygiene standards in public transport and shared mobility.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of social equity and accessibility in responsible transport policies may exacerbate health disparities and increase the risk of contagious diseases in marginalized communities.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through international transport networks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of local mobility needs and conditions in transport policy","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of cooperation and coordination in international policy making","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for increased transmission of contagious diseases due to interconnectedness and interdependencies of everyday life.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of political trust, transparency, and action leading to ineffective disease containment efforts.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reluctance to embrace individual responsibility for public health and welfare, hindering disease containment efforts.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Polarized and negative news coverage of the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Sustained exposure to negative covid-19 news causing stress and desensitisation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Decreasing interest and avoidance of covid-19 news","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of information on vaccination status","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High levels of anxiety and fear related to covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High fear of covid-19 due to pre-existing conditions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Avoidance of news about covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Losing interest in news about covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Decreasing/diminished interest and avoidance of news about covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Pandemic fatigue leading to desensitization and avoidance of news about the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Avoidance and denial of covid-19-related information leading to reduced compliance with public health measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Younger individuals losing interest in covid-19 news","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Greater post-traumatic stress symptoms associated with decreasing interest in covid-19 news","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Prolonged exposure to negative news about covid-19 causing desensitization","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Decreasing burden of negative information about covid-19 in media may decrease stress but also public interest in covid-19 news.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Greater utilization of secondary interpersonal information sources like friends and relatives may increase the risk of covid-19 fatigue and decrease interest in pandemic news.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased reliance on healthcare professionals for covid-19 information may lead to greater trust in the information but could result in decreased public interest in pandemic news.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Selection bias in online survey due to majority of respondents being women and aged 40 years.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Younger age implicated as a risk factor for non-adherence to public/social pandemic control measures.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Decreasing interest and avoidance of news about covid-19 associated with specific demographic and psychological factors.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exposure to virus during the experiment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contamination of laboratory surfaces and equipment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incorrect calculation of tcid 50 and pfu/ml","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Working in a laboratory setting with human cells and viruses poses a risk of accidental exposure and transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"}]}
